system.requirements:
Tier 2; Ballistic Skill 40 
Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Finesse
system.effect:
When makin a Single-Shot Rnaged attack against a Target with a Size Trait larger than the character's, the character can modify the hit Location result by an amount up to twice the value of the target's size Triat.
EG: Character hits a Leman Russ Tank (Size 7, Massive) with hit roll of 13, hit roll is reversed to 31, the Hull, but can be modified by up to +/- 14, in this instance, 31-->20 (Change of -11), which hits the motive system instead
